Html:
Hi,

BibWord looks good but my organisation has me stuck in a 2003 time warp.

Is there any BibWord support for Word 2003 ?

BibWord's home page suggest support for 2007 onward.

Thanks !
The citation and bibliography features were first added to Word 2007 by Microsoft. BibWord builds on those features so no, you can't use it with Word 2003.
